title: Sakura and Blue Trees
briefDescription: Hello everyone, this texture pack replaces the leaves of all the trees with a very beautiful blue (except the pines) and also swap the birch ...

crawledImageUrls.text: Hello everyone, this texture pack replaces the leaves of all the trees with a very beautiful blue (except the pines) and also swap the birch leaves for some beautiful sakura leaves
also change baby trees and creepers
you can combine this texture pack with a shader to make it look even better

title: Psycho ? PvP Texture Pack
briefDescription: Psycho is a simple, good looking pack. This pack adds smaller swords, a bow charge indicator, outlined ores, clear water, night vision, new apples, smoother ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Psycho is a simple, good looking pack. This pack adds smaller swords, a bow charge indicator, outlined ores, clear water, night vision, new apples, smoother stone texture and much more.
If you have suggestions, you can write a comment and maybe it will be in the next pack.Hope you like this new pvp resource pack!

title: Vanilla Variations [V3 Out Now!]
briefDescription: This pack aims to provide a non intrusive variation pack with vanilla feeling textures. It changes over 80 blocks and includes 328 individual textures as well as ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
This pack aims to provide a non intrusive variation pack with vanilla feeling textures. It changes over 80 blocks and includes 328 individual textures as well as including animated ores.
PLEASE give feedback, bugs, or suggestions in the comments or here: https://forms.gle/AHHkUdmrWetYrkXV9
Not tested on android, ios, or xbox
Shaders used: esbe, duped clouds.
note: shaders are NOT included in this pack.
Nice pictures of it working (you may have to look closely)

title: Wolf PvP Texture Pack
briefDescription: Are you tired of all those crazy PvP packs that change every block, every item, and all skies? Do you just want something simple that ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Are you tired of all those crazy PvP packs that change every block, every item, and all skies? Do you just want something simple that only changes what you need? Then this pack is for you!
Here are all the features you can get:
Outlines on all ores so you can see them better
Shorter swords that don?t block your screen and are not too crazy-looking
low fires for better visibility

title: Dark Fuchsia [16x]
briefDescription: This pack is dark fuchsia themed (As the name suggests). If you were in need of a simple, purplish, 16x pack recently. You are in ...

crawledImageUrls.text: This pack is dark fuchsia themed (As the name suggests). If you were in need of a simple, purplish, 16x pack recently. You are in luck my friend! This pack is right up your ally! Sadly no short swords, but no long swords either ? This pack comes with mid sized swords that everyone can enjoy!

title: Spacsy 16x (Diamond)
briefDescription: Hey, I?m spaceessence, aka space. Spacsy 16x is a Diamond PvP pack, so you could mix and match the other armor with other textures. ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Hey, I?m spaceessence, aka space. Spacsy 16x is a Diamond PvP pack, so you could mix and match the other armor with other textures. Spacsy 16x is a space themed texture pack, obviously. If you decide to download the pack, please leave constructive criticism in the comments, and subscribe. Thank you for using spacsy 16x.
COPYRIGHT: Everything posted online is already copyrighted to the creator. You DO NOT own the pack after downloading it. You also CAN NOT take anything under textures from the pack.

title: Caramel PVP Pack
briefDescription: Do you want a PVP pack that doesn't alter much of your default Minecraft experience? Well, you'd love Caramel. This texture pack adds all that ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Do you want a PVP pack that doesn?t alter much of your default Minecraft experience? Well, you?d love Caramel. This texture pack adds all that a PVP texture pack should offer, without any ?bloat features? while still sticking to the default Textures!
Low shields
Bordered ores and chests
Lower fires
Smoother wool
Better breaking
Non-intrusive weather
Pull progress
Short tools
No pumpkin blur

title: Yuyella?s Streaming Pack (Minimal Touch UI & Coordinates Hider)
briefDescription: A pack designed for streamers that makes the touch UI minimal and optionally hides the X and Z coordinate to prevent stream-sniping while playing on ...

crawledImageUrls.text: A pack designed for streamers that makes the touch UI minimal and optionally hides the X and Z coordinate to prevent stream-sniping while playing on servers. As hiding the coordinates relies on a language pack, it will only work if you?re using English (US) as your in-game language.

title: Forgs [Java Port]
briefDescription: This pack changes the textures and models of rabbits to look like frogs. It adds 7 frogs (3 default frogs, 2 cold biome frogs, 1 desert frog, 1 special frog)....

crawledImageUrls.text:
This pack changes the textures and models of rabbits to look like frogs. It adds 7 frogs (3 default frogs, 2 cold biome frogs, 1 desert frog, 1 special frog).
History: It was originally made by the user Heza on the Minecraft forums in 2017. It has also been ported before by GalaxyGlitch on mcpedl, however their version has some bugs which this pack should fix.
Contributors for the original pack: Hezakey (textures), Krixwell (Renamed Items), Bridal (Sounds)
shaders and texture packs used in images: vanilla variations, esbe shaders
Here are some images of the pack in action:
toast
plains
desert
snow
proof of permission:

title: More Elytras V2
briefDescription: This small texture pack aims to fix the rather plain, glitchy looking vanila elytra by replacing them with high-quality customizable elytra. There are 4 elytra retextures ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
This small texture pack aims to fix the rather plain, glitchy looking vanila elytra by replacing them with high-quality customizable elytra. There are 4 elytra retextures and some models that can be combined with them. ? Enjoy
Dark Phantom wings with 3d bones
Cyan Phantom wings with 3d bones
Bug/fly wings
White feathery wings
Plus 2 different wing sizes for all of them

title: Old-Styled
briefDescription: Minecraft textures has been updated but you can still use the classic ones. The only problem is, the new blocks are based on the new ...

crawledImageUrls.text: Minecraft textures has been updated but you can still use the classic ones. The only problem is, the new blocks are based on the new textures. This pack fixes it!

Screenshots: *these are only some of changed blocks and items*
I was very sad when The Nether Update has been released, and nylium, nether gold ore, crying obsidian was based on the new textures of the netherrack. So i added Old-Styled versions of them into this pack.
Screenshots: *these are only some of changed blocks and items*

title: Less Obtrusive Block Breaking Particles
briefDescription: I couldn't find any pack that makes the particles of broken blocks less annoying without completely removing them, so I made one myself. This pack ...

crawledImageUrls.text: I couldn?t find any pack that makes the particles of broken blocks less annoying without completely removing them, so I made one myself. This pack works by reducing the size of the particles, while also making them disappear and fall out of the way faster.

title: Star Wars PvP Pack
briefDescription: This pack changes most of the weapons into Star Wars themed weapons such as Blasters and Lightsabers. This pack has 6 different colours of Lightsabers, 2 different ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
This pack changes most of the weapons into Star Wars themed weapons such as Blasters and Lightsabers. This pack has 6 different colours of Lightsabers, 2 different colours of blaster ammo (one is specific to the crossbow).
You can use this pack to recreate your favourite star wars duels!
Skins shown are not included.
Here is an example of a fight you could do with this resource pack:
Here is Luke on Endor with his green lightsaber:
Here?s Lando holding his blaster about to shoot

You can recreate many star wars duels and scenes with this cool resource pack!
Now onto the textures themself:
Fireworks are now Blue Lasers which you can shoot out of Chewbacca?s Bowcaster
Crossbows are Chewbacca?s Bowcasters
Bows are now E-11 Blasters
It changes the 6 swords into 6 different coloured lightsabers:

Gold Sword ?> Yellow Lightsaber
Netherite Sword ?> Darksaber
Diamond Sword ?> Red Lightsaber

title: OSBES v0.11.1a (Open Source Bedrock Edition Shader)
briefDescription: This is an Open Source Bedrock Edition Shader.OSBES v0.11.1a (alpha testing)This shader is not compatible with currently existing custom texture packs Alpha ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
OSBES v0.11.1a (alpha testing)
Alpha testing means that you can find some bugs
If You find a bug please let me know about it by creating an issue on this shader repository page
or in this shader discord server
If you have any suggestions feel free to leave your thoughts on this shader repository page too.
Open source means that you can contribute to this shader development. On repository page you will find some contribution recommendations and instructions
Every contributor will be listed as a developer of this shader
Features of this shader:
? advanced lighting
? normal mapping
? different materials
? water effects
? weather effects
? wind effects
? airy clouds
? Better quality-to-lag ratio
(check roadmap in this shader repository for more details)
Changelog:
v0.11.1a:
? fixed sky light disappearing on high brightness levels
? fixed low frame rate water, clouds and leaves animations again (probably)
? fixed strangely looking blocks when destroying them
? fixed strange textures on dimension loading screen
? fixed puddles appearing on sunrise/sunset when it is actually not rainy
? fixed visible sun through clouds when it?s rainy
? improved and tuned water color
For texture pack creators:
discuss it with me in this server in texture-packs channel

title: Chill PvP ? Update Freeze
briefDescription: This resource pack is a very Vanilla-like pack for PvP in Minecraft. I redesigned a lot of the textures with the intent to keep them ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
This resource pack is a very Vanilla-like pack for PvP in Minecraft. I redesigned a lot of the textures with the intent to keep them still feel like Minecraft but adding a more unique style. I made this because I felt like there was a lot missing about other texture packs aimed around PvP and most didn?t resemble Vanilla.
U*Now avalible for Java Edition
These are all the textures in this pack (If I didn?t forget about them).
Blocks:
Wool-
Wood-
Glass-
Outlined Uniform Ores:
Items:
Armor:

Other:
HUD-
Bow drawback-
Block breaking-
This pack in Action!

Please do not steal any of these textures. I spent a long time making them.
If you want to use this in a video on YouTube please send a link to this McpeDl page and mention me in the video.
I hope you enjoy!
Now compatible with Dark Mode by Offroaders123!
Recommended use (In order of how it should be enabled):

title: Gem Tools and Armor
briefDescription: Are you tired out the boring old ores, tools, and armor? Are you looking for something to spice up your world? Do you just want ...

crawledImageUrls.text: Are you tired out the boring old ores, tools, and armor? Are you looking for something to spice up your world? Do you just want to try something new? Well, if any of these apply to you, or even if they don?t, this texture pack is made for you! All tools including swords, axes, pickaxes, hoes, shovels, and armor turned into gemstones! Spice up or enhance your world with this low space taking texture pack!!! You will stand out from everybody else in Minecraft. It will make your gameplay so much nicer looking! The colors can please your eyes and make you ready for anything! Hard work was put into this texture pack just for you! If you install this texture pack, I promise you will not regret it!

title: Simplified Textures!
briefDescription: This is my first texture pack I have ever made. It is meant to be a simple pack. Many mobs have been retextured. Many blocks ...

crawledImageUrls.text: This is my first texture pack I have ever made. It is meant to be a simple pack. Many mobs have been retextured. Many blocks have been retextured. And almost every item is made simpler. I am working on making a smoother UI. That will come out soon. (Making these textures isn?t so easy when you are colorblind)
